titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C33

body.ab:
<lb n="c57-0172__main__27"/>August 31th<lb n="c57-0172__main__28"/>My
beloved
Sister<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0172__main__29"/>I
write to
you
encompassed by
peril
<lb n="c57-0172__main__30"/>and ignorant
if
I am ever doomed to <lb n="c57-0172__main__31"/>see again
<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e30565__Start"/>my<del loc="c57-0172__main__d1e30565__End"/>
dear
England
& the dearer <lb n="c57-0172__main__32"/>friends that inhabit it. I am surrounded <lb n="c57-0172__main__33"/>by mountains of
ice
which admit of no
<lb n="c57-0172__main__34"/>escape
and threaten every moment
to<lb n="c57-0173__main__1"/>crush
my vessel. The brave
fellows
whom I
persua<lb n="c57-0173__main__2"/>ded to be my
companions
look
at
me for
aid
<lb n="c57-0173__main__3"/>but I have none
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to
bestow. There is
somthing
terribly appall<lb n="c57-0173__main__4"/>ing in our
situation
Yet my courage & hopes do <lb n="c57-0173__main__5"/>not desert
me —
We may
survive
& if we do
not –
<lb n="c57-0173__main__6"/>I will repeat the lessons of my
Seneca
& die with a <lb n="c57-0173__main__7"/>good heart.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0173__main__8"/>Yet
what, Margaret, will be
your
state
–
You <lb n="c57-0173__main__9"/>will not hear of my
destruction
and you will <lb n="c57-0173__main__10"/>anxiously await my
return –
Years will
pass
<lb n="c57-0173__main__11"/>and you will have visitings of
despair &<lb n="c57-0173__main__12"/>yet
be
cheered
by hope.
Oh
my beloved
sister
<lb n="c57-0173__main__13"/>the
<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30634__Start"/>siskness<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30634__End"/> sicknening
failings
of your
heart <lb n="c57-0173__main__14"/>felt
expectations
<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30639__Start"/>have<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30639__End"/> are
in
prospect
<lb n="c57-0173__main__15"/>more terrible to me than my own
death –But
<lb n="c57-0173__main__16"/>you have a
husband
and lovely
children—
<lb n="c57-0173__main__17"/>you may be
happy —
Heaven bless
you &<lb n="c57-0173__main__18"/>make
you
so.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0173__main__19"/>My <del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30656__Start"/>in<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30656__End"/>
unfortunate
gu<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30659__Start"/>i<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30659__End"/>est
regards <lb n="c57-0173__main__20"/>me with the tenderest
compassion –
He
<lb n="c57-0173__main__21"/><del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30665__Start"/>fills<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30665__End"/>
endeavours to fill me with
hope –
And <lb n="c57-0173__main__22"/>talks as if life were a
thing
which he
loved
<lb n="c57-0173__main__23"/>He reminds me how often the same acci<lb n="c57-0173__main__24"/>dents have happened to other navigators, <lb n="c57-0173__main__25"/>who have attempted
the same sea.
In <lb n="c57-0173__main__26"/>spite of
myself
he fills me with cheerful
<lb n="c57-0173__main__27"/>augu<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30686__Start"/>i<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30686__End"/>ries.
Even the sailors feel the
benefit
<lb n="c57-0173__main__28"/>of his
eloquence –
when he
speaks
they <lb n="c57-0173__main__29"/>no longer
despair –
he
rouzes
their
ener<lb n="c57-0173__main__30"/>gies&
they believe
<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30700__Start"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>when<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30700__End"/>
these vast mountains <lb n="c57-0173__main__31"/>of ice
<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30715__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30715__End"/>are mole hills
which will va<lb n="c57-0173__main__32"/>nish before the resolutions of man.
<lb n="c57-0173__main__33"/><del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30733__Start"/>But<del loc="c57-0173__main__d1e30733__End"/> this is but transitory and
each
<lb n="c57-0173__main__34"/>days
expectation
delayed,
fills them
fear &<lb n="c57-0173__main__35"/>I
almost dread
the
mutiny
of despair<lb n="c57-0174__main__1"/>September 6th<lb n="c57-0174__main__2"/>A
scene has just passed of such
<del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e30764__Start"/>curious<del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e30764__End"/>uncommoninter<lb n="c57-0174__main__3"/>rest
that although it is highly probable that
<lb n="c57-0174__main__4"/>the
papers may never reach you,
my dear <lb n="c57-0174__main__5"/>Margeret,
yet I cannot forbear recording
it. <lb n="c57-0174__main__6"/>We
are still surrounded by
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>mountains
of
ice
still in
im <lb n="c57-0174__main__7"/>minent
danger of being crushed in their
conflict.—
The cold is
excessive &<lb n="c57-0174__main__8"/><lb n="c57-0174__left_margin__1"/>many
of my unfortunate comrades have already <lb n="c57-0174__main__9"/>found a grave
admidst
this scene of <lb n="c57-0174__main__10"/>desolation. Frankenstein has
declined
daily
<lb n="c57-0174__main__11"/><del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e30823__Start"/>his<del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e30823__End"/>
in
health
a feverish fire still glim<lb n="c57-0174__main__12"/>mers in his
eyes
but he is
ex<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>hausted &<lb n="c57-0174__main__13"/>when
suddenly
rouzed
to any
exertion
he <lb n="c57-0174__main__14"/>speedily sinks again into apparent lifelessness.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0174__main__15"/>I mentioned
my last letter the fears <lb n="c57-0174__main__16"/>I
had
of
mutiny. This
morning
as I sat <lb n="c57-0174__main__17"/>watching the wan countenance of my
friend his
<lb n="c57-0174__main__18"/>eyes half
closed
and his limbs hanging
list<lb n="c57-0174__main__19"/>lessly I
was
rouzed
by half a dozen of the
<lb n="c57-0174__main__20"/>sailors
who
desired
admission into the
ca<lb n="c57-0174__main__21"/>bin
they
enter<del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e30883__Start"/>r<del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e30883__End"/>ed
& their leader
adressed
<lb n="c57-0174__main__22"/>me. He told me that he & his compani<lb n="c57-0174__main__23"/>ons had been chosen by the other sailors <lb n="c57-0174__main__24"/>to come in deputation to
me
to make
<lb n="c57-0174__main__25"/>a
demand which
in
justice
I could not <lb n="c57-0174__main__26"/>refuse. We were immured
by ice &<lb n="c57-0174__main__27"/>would
probably never
escape
but they <lb n="c57-0174__main__28"/>feared that if, as was
possible
the ice <lb n="c57-0174__main__29"/>should
be dissipated
and a free passage
<lb n="c57-0174__main__30"/>opened
I should be rash enough to conti<lb n="c57-0174__main__31"/>nue my
voyage
& lead them
to
fresh
<lb n="c57-0174__main__32"/>dangers
after they
<del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e30924__Start"/>had<del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e30924__End"/>might
happily
havesur<lb n="c57-0174__main__33"/>mounted<del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e30942__Start"/>this<del loc="c57-0174__main__d1e30942__End"/>this.
They
desired therefore
that <lb n="c57-0174__main__34"/>I should
make
a solemn
promise
that
<lb n="c57-0174__main__35"/>when
if the vessel should be
freed,
<metamark>^</metamark>that I<lb n="c57-0175__main__1"/>would
instantly direct my course
to En<lb n="c57-0175__main__2"/>gland.Archangel.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0175__main__3"/>This
speech
tro<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ubled <del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31002__Start"/>b<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31002__End"/>
me. I
<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31008__Start"/>did<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31008__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>had
not
despaired<lb n="c57-0175__main__4"/>nor
had I yet conceived the idea of
returning
<lb n="c57-0175__main__5"/>if set free. Yet could
I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>in
justice, or even in
<lb n="c57-0175__main__6"/>possibility
refuse
th<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31039__Start"/>e<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31039__End"/>is<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31048__Start"/>e<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31048__End"/><del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31053__Start"/>men<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31053__End"/>demand.
I hesitated be<lb n="c57-0175__main__7"/>fore I
answered
when
Frankenstein
who had
<lb n="c57-0175__main__8"/><del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31071__Start"/>hitherto<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31071__End"/>
at first been
silent & indeed
<lb n="c57-0175__main__9"/><lb n="c57-0175__left_margin__1"/>appeared hardly to have force enough to
attend
<lb n="c57-0175__main__10"/>now
rouzed himself.
His eyes
sparkled
<lb n="c57-0175__main__11"/>and his
cheek
flushed
was
with momentary <lb n="c57-0175__main__12"/>vigour.
<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31101__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31101__End"/>
Turning
to
the
men
he
<lb n="c57-0175__main__13"/>said; What
do you mean? What do <lb n="c57-0175__main__14"/>you demand of your captain? Are <lb n="c57-0175__main__15"/>you then so easily turned from your <lb n="c57-0175__main__16"/>design? Did you <del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31113__Start"/>n<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31113__End"/>ot
<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31116__Start"/>expect<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31116__End"/>
call this <lb n="c57-0175__main__17"/>a glorious
expedition &<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31124__Start"/>why<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31124__End"/>wherefore
was it
glorious?<lb n="c57-0175__main__18"/>Not
because the way was smooth <lb n="c57-0175__main__19"/>& placid as a
<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31143__Start"/>summer lake<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31143__End"/>southern sea
but <lb n="c57-0175__main__20"/>because it was full of dangers
&<lb n="c57-0175__main__21"/>terror – because
at every new
incident
<lb n="c57-0175__main__22"/>your fortitude was to be called
forth
& your <lb n="c57-0175__main__23"/>courage
exhibited–
Because
death
&
danger
<lb n="c57-0175__main__24"/>surrounded
you
& these
you were to <lb n="c57-0175__main__25"/>brave & overcome. For this was it a
glori<lb n="c57-0175__main__26"/>ous;
for this was it
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>an honorable
under<lb n="c57-0175__main__27"/>taking. You were
to
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>be hereafter
hailed <lb n="c57-0175__main__28"/>as the benefactors of your
species –
Your
names
<lb n="c57-0175__main__29"/>adored
as
the
brave men who encoun<lb n="c57-0175__main__30"/>tered death for
honor &<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31216__Start"/>glory<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31216__End"/>the
benefit of mankind.
–
And
now <lb n="c57-0175__main__31"/>behold
with the first
<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31227__Start"/>straw<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31227__End"/>imagination
of
danger –or
if <lb n="c57-0175__main__32"/>you
will –
The first mighty & terrific <lb n="c57-0175__main__33"/>trial
<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31239__Start"/>you shri<del loc="c57-0175__main__d1e31239__End"/>
of your
courage
you <lb n="c57-0175__main__34"/>shrink
away
& are content to be
handed<lb n="c57-0176__main__1"/>down
as men who had not strength
<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31253__Start"/>danger<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31253__End"/>to endure<lb n="c57-0176__main__2"/>cold
&
peril –
And
so
poor
souls
they were
<lb n="c57-0176__main__3"/>chilly
& returned to their warm
fire sides–Why
<lb n="c57-0176__main__4"/>that requires not this
preperation –Ye
need <lb n="c57-0176__main__5"/>not
<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31272__Start"/>co<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31272__End"/>
have come thus
far
& dragged
<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31275__Start"/>to<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31275__End"/>
your <lb n="c57-0176__main__6"/>Captain to the shame of a
defeat
to prove <lb n="c57-0176__main__7"/>yourselves cowards.
Oh
be
men
or be
<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31283__Start"/>for<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31283__End"/><lb n="c57-0176__main__8"/>more
than
men –
be steady to your
pur<lb n="c57-0176__main__9"/>poses&
firm as
rock. this ice is not made <lb n="c57-0176__main__10"/>of such stuff as your hearts
might
be.
it is
mutable
&
cannot
<lb n="c57-0176__main__11"/>withand you
if you say that it shall <lb n="c57-0176__main__12"/>not. Do not return to your families <lb n="c57-0176__main__13"/>with
<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31313__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31313__End"/>
the stigma of disgrace marked on <lb n="c57-0176__main__14"/>your
brows–
return
as heroes who have <lb n="c57-0176__main__15"/>fought &
conquered
& who know not what <lb n="c57-0176__main__16"/>it is to turn their backs on the
foe<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31322__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31322__End"/>.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0176__main__17"/>He
spoke
thus
with a voice so mo<lb n="c57-0176__main__18"/>dulated to the different feelings expressed <lb n="c57-0176__main__19"/>in his
speech –
with an eye so full of
<lb n="c57-0176__main__20"/>high
design &
heroism
that can you <lb n="c57-0176__main__21"/>wonder that
the<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31343__Start"/>n<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31343__End"/>
men were
moved –They
<lb n="c57-0176__main__22"/>looked at one
<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31350__Start"/>atho<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31350__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>another&
were unable to reply. <lb n="c57-0176__main__23"/>I
spoke.
I told them to
retire
& consider <lb n="c57-0176__main__24"/>of what had been
said.
That I would <lb n="c57-0176__main__25"/>not lead them
further
north
if they
<lb n="c57-0176__main__26"/>streneously
desired the
contrary
but that <lb n="c57-0176__main__27"/>I hoped
that
with
reflection
their courage <lb n="c57-0176__main__28"/>would
return. They retired
and I turned
to
<lb n="c57-0176__main__29"/>my
friend
but he was
sunk<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31383__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31383__End"/>
in
languor
<lb n="c57-0176__main__30"/>and almost deprived of life.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0176__main__31"/>How
<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31392__Start"/>it<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31392__End"/><del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31395__Start"/>will<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31395__End"/>
all this
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>will terminate
I <lb n="c57-0176__main__32"/>know
not.
But I had rather
die
than return
<lb n="c57-0176__main__33"/>shamefully, my
purpose
unfulfilled–Yet
<lb n="c57-0176__main__34"/>I fear
<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31423__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31423__End"/><del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31426__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31426__End"/>such
will be my
fate
The
<lb n="c57-0176__main__35"/>men <del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31436__Start"/>unf<del loc="c57-0176__main__d1e31436__End"/>
unsupported by
the
ideas of
glory<lb n="c57-0177__main__1"/>and honor can<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31446__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31446__End"/>
never willingly continue to en<lb n="c57-0177__main__2"/>dure their present hardships.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0177__main__3"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0177.01" unit="tei:date"/>September
7th<lb n="c57-0177__main__4"/>The
die is
cast.
I have consented to
return
if we <lb n="c57-0177__main__5"/>are not destroyed. Thus are my hopes
blasted–
<lb n="c57-0177__main__6"/>by cowardice and
indecision –
I come back
<lb n="c57-0177__main__7"/><del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31476__Start"/>bringing no new<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31476__End"/>ignorant& dissa<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ppointed –It
requires
a <lb n="c57-0177__main__8"/>great deal ofmore
philosophy
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>than
I
possess
to bear this injustice <lb n="c57-0177__main__9"/>with
patience –<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0177__main__10"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0177.04" unit="tei:date"/>September
12th<lb n="c57-0177__main__11"/>It
is
past.
I am returning to
<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31538__Start"/>England<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31538__End"/>Archangel.
I have <lb n="c57-0177__main__12"/>lost my hopes of utility &
glory –I
have lost <lb n="c57-0177__main__13"/>my friend. But
<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31550__Start"/>if<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31550__End"/>
I
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>will
endeavour <lb n="c57-0177__main__14"/>to detail
the
bitter circumstances to you, <lb n="c57-0177__main__15"/>my dear
sister – And
while I am wafted <lb n="c57-0177__main__16"/>towards
England
& towards
you
I will not
<lb n="c57-0177__main__17"/>despair. <del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31572__Start"/>Sep<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31572__End"/><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0177__main__18"/>September 9th
The ice began to
move
<lb n="c57-0177__main__19"/>and roarings like thunder
was
heard <lb n="c57-0177__main__20"/>at a
distance
as the
<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31589__Start"/>mountains<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31589__End"/>islands
split <lb n="c57-0177__main__21"/>& cracked in every direction. We were <lb n="c57-0177__main__22"/>in the most
eminent peril – But
as we <lb n="c57-0177__main__23"/>could only remain
passive
my chief at<lb n="c57-0177__main__24"/>tention was
<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31609__Start"/>co<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31609__End"/>
occupied by my unfor<lb n="c57-0177__main__25"/>tunate
guest
whose illness
encreased to
<lb n="c57-0177__main__26"/>such a
degree
that
<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31621__Start"/>to<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31621__End"/>
he was entirely <lb n="c57-0177__main__27"/>confined to his bed. The ice cracked be<lb n="c57-0177__main__28"/>hind
us
and was driven with force <lb n="c57-0177__main__29"/>towards the
north –
a breeze sprung <lb n="c57-0177__main__30"/>from
that quarter –<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>andon
the 11th the passage
to <lb n="c57-0177__main__31"/>wards
the south
<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31662__Start"/>was<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31662__End"/>became free <del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31670__Start"/>on th<del loc="c57-0177__main__d1e31670__End"/><lb n="c57-0177__main__32"/>When
the sailors saw
this
& that their <lb n="c57-0177__main__33"/>return
towards
their native country <lb n="c57-0177__main__34"/>was apparently
assured
a shout of
<lb n="c57-0177__main__35"/>tumutuous
joy broke from
them<lb n="c57-0178__main__1"/>loud
&
long continued.– Frankenstein
who was
dozing <lb n="c57-0178__main__2"/>awokede
& asked the
reason
of the
tumult– I was unable to <lb n="c57-0178__main__3"/>reply. He asked again – They shout
I
said be<lb n="c57-0178__main__4"/>cause
they will soon return to
England.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0178__main__5"/>Do
you then really
return.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0178__main__6"/>Alas yes.
I cannot
with<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e31718__Start"/>a<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e31718__End"/>stand
their
<lb n="c57-0178__main__7"/>demands –
I cannot lead them
<del loc="c57-0178__main__d1e31723__Start"/>to
